Posts.Title: Narrow margin of clear tissue after a breast cancer lumpectomy.

Posts.Content: Thats shocking my local private pharmacy gets it in 24 hrs.  I today have just finished my radiotherapy using R1 R 2 cream which I am so glad I had.  My skin is pink but not sore and no blisters.  I have a small rash underneath this is because I am a larger size 38 lady.  I put the r1 gel on in the changing room straight after.  The R2 are very small sachets I had to use 4 each time depends on your size.  Good luck to you I hope it goes as well for you as it did for me.
